title: 5 people afk in a row whot do I win?
body: Riot Games are you encouraging being idle in the games, is there some extra loot for feeding and being inactive? Maybe I should be doing it too.

replies.body: i've been playing LoL for too long to have this kind of situations even bother me.

I got 1 troll ghost/cleanse teemo, then an afk flaming janna right after. Worst part is that nothing will happen to them by reporting. Both promo games down the drain because of a couple of thin skinned goons. Feels bad man, but it's just your average LoL.

I give Riot my full permission to instantly ban you for premeditated AFK.

Doing things to others, because you don't like it being done to you, is the epitome of immaturity.

No one needs to be taught what a hypocrite is. Kindergarten stuff.
